snippet: A long title is only the beginning of the brashness in “A Beautiful Day in November on the Banks of the Greatest of the Great Lakes.”
abstract: Kate Benson play A Beautiful Day in November on the Banks of the Greatest of the Great Lakes manages to accurately evoke feeling of holiday dinner with extended family using no sets or props; show is set to open at City Center Stage II.
lead_paragraph: A long title is only the beginning of the brashness in “A Beautiful Day in November on the Banks of the Greatest of the Great Lakes.”

headline.seo: Staging ‘A Beautiful Day in November on the Banks of the Greatest of the Great Lakes’
headline.main: Mapping Out a Holiday With the Family
